revised_title: Classification of Leptosporangiate Ferns based on Sorus Structure and Development
tldr: The author proposes a new classification system for leptosporangiate ferns based on the structure and development of their sori (spore-producing organs). The system divides ferns into three main groups: Simplices (with simultaneous sporangia origin), Gradates (with basipetal sporangia succession), and Mixtes (with sporangia of various ages intermixed). This classification is supported by additional evidence from anatomy and gametophyte details.
